By god I could have never guessed that this game would have brought me so much joy. Jesus christ this game is unbelievably fun! 10/10 would recommend!

38881699.review: Really fun but brutally hard bullethell arcade shooter.  If you die you know it's because you messed up in some way, whether it be moving in the wrong direction at the wrong time or miss timing an attack.  I had the game running while I was afk for about 5 hours, but it took me roughly 2 hours to 100%.  Super cheap price and super fun - Would recommend.

38303234.review:
It quite lives up to it name, Ubermosh. It's a very fast paced bullet hell where you play as the Blade Saint, a person wielding two laser swords and whatever guns you manage to pick up as you battle hordes of people sent into the desert to attain enlightenment by dying at your blade. Shoot rediculously overpowered guns. Reflect bullets with your swords. It's some serious fun. If that sounds like your thing then I definitely recommend this game. It's short but has some good replay value. Plus, with it's price tag there isn't much to stop you from getting it!
The only thing I can really think that it is missing is an endless onslaught version, that would be awesome.

Glorious Blade Saint, BRING US UBERMOSH!!!

37947420.review: By far the most fun Ubermosh so far, with each volume feeling like a slight improvement over the last. The only issue I've experienced is a slowdown (including the clock slowing for some reason..?) when there are too many enemies on-screen, which honestly actually makes the game easier at that point haha. Other than that, the animation feels more fluid than the previous iterations, and the same arcade gameplay is still solid.

37947205.review:
Продолжение серии игр UBERMOSH, UBERMOSH:BLACK, UBERMOSH Vol.3 и UBERMOSH:WRAITH

Неплохая аркада - стрелялка с видом сверху, графоном в ретро стиле и динамичной музыкой. 
Играя за кибер ниндзю нужно уничтожить как можно больше врагов за отведённое время.
В арсенале есть только меч и пушки, которые можно собирать с убитых врагов.  

Игра повторяет четвёртую часть UBERMOSH:WRAITH. с некоторыми изменениями.
- У персонажа отросла ещё одна пара рук и теперь он может нести два меча и две пухи одновременно
- Повысили планку очков, необходимых для получения достижений.
- Теперь перед боем можно выбрать щит.

В этой части было гораздо легче получить достижения.

36872287.review:
the 5th installment to the possibly ongoing ubermosh mini-series

created by 1 guy, and clearly a very talented one at that. originally this review was just for the steam awards but im taking the time to let you, whoever may be reading this figure out if it's worth the 99 cents (which it is if you're into top-down shooters)

originally ubermosh consisted of you, a sword, and a gun 

vol 5 not only contains multiple classes from previous installments but some newer mechanics and another new class which doesn't change much really but more is always welcome.

you are also allowed to select what sort of ability you want, wether you have only guns or wether you use only your sword to cut bullets. you have a limited amount of lives with each class and each have unique strats.

each game only lasts about 2 mins and dying can be pretty easy if you're too reckless.

if you enjoy a nice quick game and love adreneline while also loving top-down shooters. 

than you'll love this game. it's worth the 99 cents

plus the ost is so good

hopefully this will convince some of you people out there

35833952.review: Un gran juego arcade para su bajo costo, simple, adictivo y para pasar un rato de ira por una dificultad altamente elevada pero justa.

35805468.review:
Ubermosh is just something that I can't believe. The developer actively listens to the players' feedback and with each release/version of Ubermosh that comes out, it just gets better and better. This is why I play video games. Fast action, crazy hard, yet never actually pisses me off. It is so much fun, so buttery smooth yet the controls are super tight.

This game may be tiny, but there's different ways to play it.

Try a "Co-Op": One player uses a controller to move the character, and the other uses a mouse/controller to aim and shoot. This'll get a few laughs for sure.

You can try playing with the in game mods or try doing weird personal challenges like "only run left" or "can't move" challenges. 

Simple, short and sweet, but extremely fun to boot up a few times a week in between playing bigger games.

Ubermosh is just awesome.

35608380.review:
One day I was browsing the steam store aimlessly, looking at the cheaper games for something, anything new and interesting.

I was expecting jack shit.

I got UBERMOSH.

This game is fast-paced, brutally unforgiving, and satisfying as hell to play. It rewards skill and fast reactions, and punishes slip-ups whenever they occur. The soundtrack is incredible and fits the mood perfectly. Perhaps best of all, the developer is kind, friendly, and responsive to the community.

Oh, and it cost me all of 49 cents.

Buy this game.

35163265.review: Amazing game in an amazing series. So simple yet so fun, and the price point is absolutely perfect.

35003087.review:
While a decent addition to the Ubermosh compilation and overall a fun time if you've enjoyed the earlier volumes, it seems like the game itself got somehow easier. Get it if you really liked the earlier games, but there's not too much new.

Suggestions:
1) Make/add enemies with more health, currently there's a binary between shielded (run away) and unshielded (run towards). It would make for a little bit more stimulating gameplay.
2) Remove some obsolete guns, I guess it could be a skill thing if you need dodge bodies to avoid picking up a worse gun, but some that are apparently interchangeable on the gun 'tier' list are definitely worse.
3) Remove class distinctions entirely (!), maybe make a set of sliders for powers you can exchange for a certain amount of lives. (3 lives for gunner auto, 1 for increasingly powerful map clear).

I would still recommend this, but if there are future volumes I'd love some of the above incorporated.

34939446.review: This game is fantastic, and simply builds upon the greatness of its predecessors. Buy them all.

34647183.review:
Of the Ubermosh series this is the (at the moment)
last and best part (imo). 
While there are a few little things that could be better:

-No options menu (if I didn't have a mouse with a dpi-switch I would have a problem)
-The top and bottom of the screen are still dangerous, because the enemies are much closer than the left & right side of the screen when they show up.
-You can't choose which weapon to pick up which leads to dodging all the guns that are lying on the ground in the early game. (after getting one of course)

The game in itself is a great, high-speed, rampage top-down shooter which needs full concentration, but is overall much more fair and fun than the previous installments, because compared to those it's far less random. Overall it is a nice little game for a great price, for the moments when you feel wide awake and concentrated.

34366194.review: All the fun of the previous Ubermosh games but with a nice new boon, Plus an amazing menu screen.  One hell of a bullethell topdown and one of the best.  Music is as the other games, bangin.  Vol 5 Was amazing, and for the price its at now, its well worth it.

34362691.review:
UBERMOSH Vol.5 is a fantastic indie game. It combines unique gun and swordplay with fast paced movement and an equally fast soundtrack which ties the game together and brings it from good to great. One can use keyboard and mouse controls or a controller. I cannot speak for controllers (I don't own one), but the controls on keyboard are tight and responsive, as are the mouse controls. While the game is difficult to learn at first, you soon will find the combination that works for you, and discover how the AI opponents move. I would personally recommend purchasing the UBERMOSH collection, as the storyline to the UBERMOSH series is spread among all of them. [spoiler] and the dev is awesome. [/spoiler]

I will edit this to include controller support as soon as I can access one.

33203348.review:
What can I say about this entry of UBERMOSH that I haven't already said in a previous review? Let's just say that this series got me into fast-paced bullet hell shooters. And Vol.5 certainly adds more to not just the fast-paced action, but more to our heroine, the Blade Saint.

Difficulty-wise, it's slightly easier than Wraith with the addition of the Shield and Melter abilities, but only very slightly. It still takes skill to last 90 seconds in this arena of madness. Underneath it's still that UBERMOSH gameplay that we all know and love, with more being built on with each instalment.

One thing I do want to see though: I want to see more established lore! I want to know more about the Blade Saint's journey and a timeline has already been established (with SWARMRIDERS, then the original UBERMOSH, then BLACK) so I'd want to see some more on her story and how she's developed.

Still, yet another solid entry and hats off to Walter Machado!

32413480.review:
Solid, better than Wraith. 
Screen clutter is still an issue with more enemies and faster gameplay, and I'd prefer to be able to fire the manastrike manually, maybe with right-click? That'd give me a reason to set the ability on something other than circular. Maybe an audio cue for when the ability is about to fire? It's pretty hard to time and aim as it is... 
Difficulty is fine for me. Just about the same as before, only I've gotten better with the game. Could also have used new sounds and OST, as well as visuals, but for the price, the game is a steal. 
Recommended. Grab the collection, Ubermosh has earned it in my book.

32263284.review: Up to date, this must be the easiest issue of "Ubermosh". I would recommend it, first of all, to ones who didn't play older, harder versions. I read and re-read Walter's notes about "cloned attack", but for me it was perceived just as Green shoots and slices at 2x speed (except the Gunner class which shoots at instane rate). The game is still fun, but it took me only 78 minutes to get all achievements, - on hardcore mode! - and this is first Ubermosh where I dared to peek at pop-up notifications from IM and didn't got punished for that. Rate of semi-automatic fire is such that with better or best gun you can successfully maintain "Inbox 0" strategy by keeping your screen clear of enemies.  So after completing Volume 5, I felt strong urge to download and play Ubermosh 1. Another small notice: the only way to hear great intro soundtrack is to play Tutorial. Why it isn't included in regular games? Anyway, big thanks to the author, and, as always, looking forward for the next release!

32166144.review:
어느 순간 라이브러리에 들어있던 '우버모쉬' 시리즈의 5번째 제품인 [b]《우버모쉬 5》[/b]다. 이쯤 되면 조금씩 조금씩 시스템을 추가해서 다음 시리즈로 내놓는다는 것이 확실하다고 말할 수 있다. 전작에 비해 크게 달라지지 않았지만, 그 변화가 또 눈에 띄지 않을 만큼 작은 것도 아니기에 나는 이 '우버모쉬' 시리즈가 점점 더 발전되는 방향으로 나아가고 있다고 본다.

 + 기존 우버모쉬 시리즈를 소유한 유저에게 무료로 제공해주는 개발진의 초월운영(충성 충성 충성)
 + 여전히 맘에 드는 특유의 타격감
 + 여전히 플레이 내내 귀에 탁탁 꽂히는 신나는 BGM
 + 특정 킬 마다 빔&쉴드 둘 중 하나가 발생되는 시스템 추가(게임 시작 전에 유저가 정할 수 있다)
 + 여전히 스피디한 진행으로 인해 쉽게 질리지가 않는다
 + 새롭게 추가된 시스템 덕분인지 오히려 전작인 4편 보다는 도전과제 올클리어가 더 쉬웠다
 
 - 단점? 글쎄, 원래도 워낙 괜찮은 인디게임인데 공짜로 받았으니 무슨 단점이 보일래야 보이지 않는다

32055654.review:
全成就撒花~
前些天看到有好友在说SWARMRIDERS全成就了，也给予了游戏很高的评价，有机会要入OST的，我想起此作的OST是进大包的，就去翻看了一下，然后就发现UBERMOSH已经出到五了。
此系列除了第二作有去除了第一作中的建筑障碍，将地形扩大到无边界外，下一作都只是在前作的基础上加一些枪支/兵种/技能，变化都不大。本作中新增了一种射线技能（触发条件具体还不明，除了剑圣模式外都在700杀敌数之后会发动一次，全程最多触发两次，在剑圣模式中好像触发的间隔更短一些）。本作中的枪支射速和武器攻速貌似也做了提升。
这个系列是越来越简单了。

32031174.review:
Some may say that there is no story or lore, but if you listen each menu audio, see how the character changed each volume and try to understand how that violence affected the protagonist and her combat skills affected that universe your mind will open to the sharp details of UBERMOSH. The tribal drums, the distorted guitars, the vibrant colors.
I would call it a crossover from gothic-punk and surf-metal. It may sound absurd, until you check... ...UUBEEEEERMOOOOSH!

32011291.review:
[h1]高難易度アクションSTG５作目[/h1]
[url=store.steampowered.com/sub/95016/]UBERMOSHシリーズ[/url]の５作目です。
＋α的な追加要素が重ねられたこのシリーズですが、今作もその流れに沿ったものとなります。
※このシリーズが初なら、１作目から始めた方が序々に進化するプロセスをより楽しめます。
[url=store.steampowered.com/app/586350/]UBERMOSH:WRAITH[/url]からの変更点は
・自動発動する選択武器の追加　レーザービームor保護シールド　（雷撃とは別枠）
・敵出現数の増大

[h1]自分はより強力に[/h1]
大きく難易度の下がった[u]前作WRAITHよりも難易度が下がっています。[/u]
レーザーは照準方向に貫通レーザーを照射
シールドは敵の攻撃から身を守ることができます。
どちらも短時間ですが、事故死を減らしてくれる強力な技です。

[h1]敵は強くなっていない[/h1]
実績の撃破目標数が+400されているので[u]敵出現数が増えているはず…
ですが、プレイ中それに気付かない程度の変化[/u]でした。
プレイキャラが強過ぎてヌルゲー化していますね。

[h1]動作が軽量になった[/h1]
撃破数が増えても落ちたり重くならないように改良されています。
[u]低スペックPCでも遊びやすく[/u]してくれたみたいですね。

31999410.review:
The Blade Saint strikes again!

It´s like a new issue of a favorite comic that just got better.

31998258.review:
UBERMOSH (for those who don't know) is a 90 second arcade style arena with you playing as a blade saint on an alien planet, the 5th installment in the series (with the very original and imaginative name vol 5) is both the hardest and the most enjoyable. The graphics are what you expect from a game in this genre, and the OST is one of the best in video game history.

This version has the most going on, with you being the most overpowered in any game, and the same being said for your enemies, this is an open field one. On top of the brainclap system from black, and the manastrike system from wraith, you now have another system, either ANOTHER death beam or a shield. The shield is a waste of time to me but you might find it useful. The death beam is slightly worse of a screen clearer than brainclap, but still helps in a sticky situation. The system of having that green arm thingy i haven't noticed in combat, but i'm sure it helps with the guns, the enemies are slightly harder but so is the protagonist to make up for it

I have a few complaints though. There should be a way to turn the sound down, as it can be a bit loud at times. and i never know when a brainclap, manastrike, or whatever the new thing is called will activate, so countdowns would be nice. and i would also like the option to toggle between open field combat and the thing from the first 2 games.  Multiplayer would be a nice feature in future games as well as maybe a campaign story later on (because the whole idea of the blade saint and the desert of ulta-kaan is a brilliant idea).

In closing, get this game, its not perfect, but its the most fun and the most chaotic, which is the spirit of ubermosh. also i feel bad because i bought the ulta-kaan collection when it was on sale for £0.95.

31960005.review:
[h1]Кратко об игре: [/h1]
[b]Неожиданно, шестая часть серии Ultakaar Chronicles (пятая часть UBERMOSH) оказалась в моей библиотеке. Разработчик снова радует подарком - очередным часом резни в пустынях Ультакаара. Во всех традициях предшественников.[/b]

[h1]Что тут у нас, в отличие от предыдущих частей? [/h1]
[b]Геймплей[/b]
Нового класса не появилось, новая способность на выбор Melter/Shield, повысились планки достижений. Melter - срабатывает лазерный луч, разрушающий щиты врагов, на пару секунд через определенное кол-во времени; Shield - щит на несколько секунд, срабатывает так же через определенное время. Меч теперь наносит два быстрых удара сразу (у героини ж теперь 4 руки).
[b]Графика и артворк [/b]
Изменился внешний вид персонажа и арт в главном меню.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=932795937
[b]Сюжет [/b]
Прошло большое кол-во времени. Героиня стала полностью божественной и обрела просвещение. [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=885312840]Читать руководство о сюжете этой серии игр.[/url]
[b]Саундтрек [/b]
Разработчик добавил новые композиции.

[h1]Читайте обзоры предыдущих частей, чтобы больше узнать![/h1]
[code]Обзоры игр серии UBERMOSH (Ultakaar Chronicles) 
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/monfromcen/recommended/586350/]←Предыдущий[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/monfromcen/recommended/357070/]1[/url]  [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/monfromcen/recommended/444940/]2[/url]  [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/monfromcen/recommended/490230/]3[/url]  [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/monfromcen/recommended/515570/]4[/url]  [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/monfromcen/recommended/586350/]5[/url]  6  [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/monfromcen/recommended/714240/]7[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/monfromcen/recommended/714240/]Следующий→[/url][/code]

31959148.review:
O que parecia já estar no seu nível máximo, superou todos os limites de uma forma excepcional!

O sistema de braços duplicados junto com o melter e o escudo, deram novos caminhos pra criar uma experiência ainda mais badass!

Nem vou afirmar que é a versão definitiva da série, por que é bem provável que o Wlater nos surpreenda novamente no futuro!

Só jogando ppra sentir a nova vibe. Entrei na primeira partida com o kensai, meu modo favorito, e quando executei o primeira ataque e vi as duas espadas, o sangue ferveu, o que é característico da série!

Se você ainda não tem, compre todos os volumes e sinta a evolução avassaladora!

O que será que ainda está por vir?

Hell yeah!

31958024.review:

[*]Great "management" feel in the heat of combat
[*]Simply fun gameplay

Cons:[list]

Another nice continuation to the UBERMOSH series, recommended.
